level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is SectionsV(A) and V of Reorganization Plan No. 4 of 1983, 30 DCR 6428 (December 16,983), effective March 2, 1984 and the Fiscal Year 1997 Budget Support Emergencyct of 1996, D.C. Act 11-429, effective October 18, 1996; D.C. Code §§ 1-337;-1071; 10-1141.01 et seq.; 50-921.02 to -921.06; Mayor’s Orders 96-8,6-175, 2002-102, 2006-22, 2008-116.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Regulations published at 43 DCR 6581, 6585 (December 13, 1996);enumbered by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 8562, 8564 ( September 13,002 ).
